thread.title: Gerrado the star of the show
thread.title_full: Gerrado the star of the show - Review of Hotel La Lanterne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Brendan S
title: Gerrado the star of the show
text: We came to this amazing boutique hotel for a little weekend break from London, and we were met by a very friendly Gerrado who was most attentive friendly and very helpful with any requests we had.it was our second time away with our 10 month daughter and Gerrado made us feel very welcome and helped with all our baby and wine requests.Such an amazing time amazing service. Would highly recommend.
